snippet.title: Wholesome: Heartdrawn - 2024 Story Teaser Trailer
snippet.description:
Lyra wants to be a witch, but she can't... So, what should she do next?

Wholesome: Heartdrawn is a Turn-Based RPG and adventure game about Lyra, who creates her world to imagine her memories to escape from some things. Explore real and imagined worlds, and go on adventures. Lead Lyra and help her handle everything.

Check out Wholesome: Heartdrawn here!
Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2415680
Itch.io: https://daybloomproject.itch.io/wholesome-heartdrawn
